name: ThfDigital
tag_list: human-resource, career-management, job-boards, conferences, events, consulting-services, employee-development-training, employment-law, human-resources-support
overview: THFDigital is an endeavor to bring forth world-class practices in the field of Human Resources. The forum is an extension to “The Human Factor” Magazine, published by Planman Media. The concept was born out of the vision of leading economist and management guru Prof. Arindam Chaudhuri, bringing to light the human face of Indian business that had remained obscure for a long time. Covering an entire expanse, from designing and execution to the evaluation of organizational strategies and employee performance; THFDigital is a one-stop shop for complete HR solutions. Its interactive features have been designed to facilitate a two-way communication to raise the key issues faced by HR professionals across the world. We are backed by a team of experts, who with their path-breaking but viable ideas, are committed to revolutionize the world of Human Resources.
